stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Choose a card type, then reveal the grip. You may pay X credits to place X advancement tokens on an installed card. X is equal to or less than the number of revealed cards of the chosen type.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Choose a card type, then reveal the grip. You may pay X[credit] to place X advancement tokens on an installed card. X is equal to or less than the number of revealed cards of the chosen type.
title: Focus Group
